text: FK Polet is a Serbian football club based in Novi Karlovci, Serbia. Polet Novi Karlovci Polet Novi Karlovci Category:1927 establishments in Serbia Club has been founded by two brothers which surname is Bajic. Club was founded in 1927. Highest peak was when club was playing in Vojvodjanska Liga. Currently they are playing in MOL Srem East.
title: FK Polet Novi Karlovci
